column6: X-Factor headquarters is under siege! As the birth of Wolfsbane's baby draws near, demonic forces pound at their door, desperate to steal the child away. How will X-Factor battle the supernatural? Salvation may just arrive in a very familiar form...
column8: | writer:Peter David | editor:Daniel Ketchum | penciller:EMANUELA LUPACCHINO | penciller (cover):David Yardin
